Four critical vulnerabilities in Live Server, Markdown Preview Enhanced, Code Runner, and Microsoft Live Preview affect 125M+ installs. CVE-2025-65717 (CVSS 9.1) lets any malicious website silently exfiltrate your local files while Live Server is running. Three CVEs remain unpatched with no response from maintainers.
